results.title: The Graduate (Special edition)
results.creator_credit: Lawrence Turman, Embassy Pictures Corporation (US), Lawrence Turman Inc and Mike Nichols
results.brief_description: Mentally adrift after graduating from college, Benjamin Braddock is pressured by both family and friends to take on the responsibilities of adulthood, namely to marry and find a job. But the exhortation of family friend, Mr. Robinson, to seize every possible opportunity inspires Ben to accept Mrs. Robinson’s offers of sex. Shortly after, Ben is pushed into dating the Robinsons’ daughter, Elaine, and after falling in love with her he finds himself in the compromising position of maintaining a relationship with both women. Also includes a 45 min. documentary on the making of the film. Cast includes: Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft, Katherine Ross, William Daniels, Elizabeth Wilson and Murray Hamilton.

results.title: The Graduate
results.creator_credit: Lawrence Turman, Embassy Pictures Corporation (US), Lawrence Turman Inc and Mike Nichols
results.brief_description: Dustin Hoffman stars as college graduate Benjamin Braddock, who spends his first summer out of school being seduced by the wife of his father’s best friend. He also falls in love with the woman’s daughter to further complicate his life. Nominated for 7 Academy Awards, The Graduate won the Oscar for Best Direction, (Mike Nichols), and its brilliant score by Simon and Garfunkle won 3 Grammies. Ann Bancroft is the memorable Mrs. Robinson, with Katherine Ross as her daughter and rival for Benjamin’s affection. “The Graduate” is a modern comedy classic to be enjoyed again and again.

results.title: The Goya effect
results.creator_credit: Ian Latimer, Michael Tuchner and Rank Aldis Industrial Services
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Manager in Action”.
Demonstrates the limitations of formal information systems. Highlights the importance of spending time at the “sharp” end and the role of non-verbal signals in face to face communication. Intended for middle and junior managers in industrial and commercial organisations.

results.title: The Gospel According to St Matthew = Il Vangelo Secondo Matt
results.creator_credit: Alfredo Bini, Arco Films (US), Lux Film and Pier Pasolini
results.brief_description: The Gospel According to St Matthew is a startlingly visual rendering of the biblical story of Christ. Acted entirely by non-professionals, Pasolini’s adaptation blends breath-taking photography with an astounding musical score (from Bach to Billie Holliday) to create a unique vision which is both profoundly religious and forcefully political. Original title: Il Vangelo Secondo Matteo. In Italian with English subtitles.

results.title: The Goonies [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Richard Donner and Harvey Bernhard
results.brief_description: When a group of greedy developers decide to demolish the headquarters of the Goonies - a group of adventurous youngsters, it seems that the gang will have to disband. By pure coincidence they they encounter a 17th century pirate map and set out on an adventure to locate the treasure and raise the necessary money to save the property. It quickly becomes apparent that they aren’t the only people interested in the treasure when they cross paths with a group of criminals. The Goonies start to live up to their adventurous mission more than ever when they enter a fabulous subterranean world and are forced into a series of events that could mean the difference between life, death and the future of their home. Cast includes Sean Astin, Josh Brolin, Jeff Cohen, Corey Feldman and Martha Plimpton.

results.title: The Goon Bible Project
results.brief_description:
This flash animation re-tells the Old Testament narrative of Job’s trials with a healthy dose of irreverance and sly humour.
WARNING: This film contains some strong language and content that may offend some viewers.
